metadata.title: CVE-2019-12469 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
MediaWiki through 1.32.1 has Incorrect Access Control. Suppressed usernameor log in Special:EditTags are exposed. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and1.27.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
